Articles.Content:
Maybe make it a bit like the fairings where you use the mouse for making custom wings.

 

 

Edited January 21, 2016 by TheAbsoluteDoge
It'll be cool to be in stock, but for now look at B9 Procedural Parts.

I hate to bust bubbles but NOOOOOOOOOO!!!

This is only my personal opinion, please take no offense. I just don't like the idea at all about procedural wings. 

It's a thing for mods to do not stock KSP, in my opinion.

Again, I do not mean anything personal or for it to be an attack, I'm just putting my 2 cents worth in the discussion.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

3 hours ago, YargJay9991 said:

I hate to bust bubbles but NOOOOOOOOOO!!!

This is only my personal opinion, please take no offense. I just don't like the idea at all about procedural wings. 

It's a thing for mods to do not stock KSP, in my opinion.

Again, I do not mean anything personal or for it to be an attack, I'm just putting my 2 cents worth in the discussion.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

Have you ever tried the pWings though? I think I am more of a plane guy. I actually thought the same about them and always stated they should stay as a mod, but then I installed the B9 mod and found out the pWings are far superior than the stock ones. There are so many ways in whcih they can be customized, which isn't the case with stock modular wings.

Edited January 21, 2016 by Veeltch

8 hours ago, Veeltch said:

Have you ever tried the pWings though? I think I am more of a plane guy. I actually thought the same about them and always stated they should stay as a mod, but then I installed the B9 mod and found out the pWings are far superior than the stock ones. There are so many ways in whcih they can be customized, which isn't the case with stock modular wings.

Ok, to be honest no I haven't tried pWings. I guess I just don't like mods that have procedural parts in them. I don't mind the fairings being procedural, but wings would be to much for me. It just would feel kerbal at all IMO. 

I really only like building stock aircraft replicas in KSP so pWings sound like cheating to me.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

36 minutes ago, YargJay9991 said:

Ok, to be honest no I haven't tried pWings. I guess I just don't like mods that have procedural parts in them. I don't mind the fairings being procedural, but wings would be to much for me. It just would feel kerbal at all IMO. 

I really only like building stock aircraft replicas in KSP so pWings sound like cheating to me.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

Fair enough. But even though I would encourage you to try it out.
